Name: Horror Vacui
Description: Nature abhors a vacuum. Expect almost anything. ~6x5 base. MEV and DEA are REQUIRED. Bitfix-based aggro cap of 75 in mind. B3: Charger renamed to Scuttler and reworked to be more vulnerable. Bulwark changed to be less spammy. Fester nexus nerfed a little more. Architect slowed down more. Small changes to the pressure controllers.
